events.title: Add real events here
events.description: Open public/data/events.json and replace these demo items with real events (festivals, pop-ups, exhibitions) travelers can join.

events.title: Example: Night market / food festival
events.description: Write 1–2 lines: what it is, who it’s for, and why a traveler should care.

events.title: Example: Cultural performance / seasonal festival
events.description: Keep it short, clear, and practical. Add an official link when possible.
